def is_in_washing_machine(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    # Function to check if the shirt is already inside the washing machine
    symbol inside_washing_machine = inside(shirt, washing_machine)
    return inside_washing_machine

behavior load_shirt_in_washing_machine(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Load the shirt into the washing machine

behavior start_washing_machine(washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve closed(washing_machine)
        # Close the washing machine door
        achieve is_on(washing_machine)
        # Turn on the washing machine

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select the shirt
        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Select the washing machine

        if not is_in_washing_machine(shirt, washing_machine):
            load_shirt_in_washing_machine(shirt, washing_machine)
            # Ensure the shirt is loaded into the washing machine
        
        start_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Start the washing machine to wash the shirt
